items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Walker Solvent makes cleaning up hair systems refreshingly simple.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Walker Solvent makes cleaning up hair systems refreshingly simple. It leaves behind such a small amount of oily residue that cleanup amounts to a quick rinse with soap and water. Walker Solvent is a budget-friendly choice that is an excellent choice for solvent soaks.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.

(Not available in California. This product cannot be shipped to California.)
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.storedescription:
Head: Spray adhesive residue, and let soak for two minutes. Spray a second time, and wipe clean. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup. Remove residue, shampoo, and rinse. Saturating the adhesive area and wiping off the residue once breakdown has occurred will help give the best results. We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

 

System: Once removed from the scalp, soak in a bowl of Walker Solvent while cleaning the head.


 

To Do a Solvent Soak: Fill a large bowl or sink with Walker Solvent. Place the system into the solvent, base side up. Keep the system submerged and work the adhesive build up off. Wear gloves to keep your hands out of direct contact with the solution. Shampoo the system and rinse. Soak times vary from 5-30 minutes, depending on the type of system and adhesive used.
items.pagetitle: Walker Solvent - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top | Walker Tape
